interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.CurrentHumidityLevel
interface.description: This interface provides capability to represent qualitative level of relative humidity.

property.name: CurrentLevel
property.description: Qualitative representation of current relative humidity level

property.name: MaxLevel
property.description: Maximum value aallowed for represented relative humidity level

method.name: GetHumidityLevelsInfo
method.description: Invoke this method to get information about the humidity levels in string format
